Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.bootstrap

Class BootstrapContext

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.bootstrap.BootstrapContext
public class BootstrapContext extends Object
Context object holding configuration needed for JCR bootstrap.

Immutable value object passed to JcrBootstrapStrategy implementations.

Since:
5.2.0

  • Constructor Details

    • BootstrapContext

      public BootstrapContext(List<String> cndPatterns, List<String> yamlPatterns, List<String> hcmConfigPatterns, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new bootstrap context.
      Parameters:
      cndPatterns - CND resource patterns (e.g., "classpath*:org/example/**\/*.cnd")
      yamlPatterns - YAML content resource patterns
      hcmConfigPatterns - HCM config resource patterns (optional, may be null or empty)
      classLoader - ClassLoader to use for resource loading

    • BootstrapContext

      public BootstrapContext(List<String> cndPatterns, List<String> yamlPatterns, List<String> hcmConfigPatterns, List<Path> moduleDescriptors, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new bootstrap context with explicit module descriptors.
      Parameters:
      cndPatterns - CND resource patterns (e.g., "classpath*:org/example/**\/*.cnd")
      yamlPatterns - YAML content resource patterns
      hcmConfigPatterns - HCM config resource patterns (optional, may be null or empty)
      moduleDescriptors - explicit hcm-module.yaml paths (optional)
      classLoader - ClassLoader to use for resource loading

  • Method Details

    • getCndPatterns

      public List<String> getCndPatterns()
      Returns:
      CND resource patterns for node type registration

    • getYamlPatterns

      public List<String> getYamlPatterns()
      Returns:
      YAML content resource patterns

    • getHcmConfigPatterns

      public List<String> getHcmConfigPatterns()
      Returns:
      HCM config resource patterns (used by manual strategy)

    • getModuleDescriptors

      public List<Path> getModuleDescriptors()
      Returns:
      explicit hcm-module.yaml paths

    • getClassLoader

      public ClassLoader getClassLoader()
      Returns:
      ClassLoader for resource loading
